title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.7 - Attachment to labor market
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 363.7 - Attachment to labor market

State Regulations

In determining continued attachment to the labor market, consideration shall be given to evidence of recent past work record, registration at labor employment office, frequency and regularity of
application for employment and other relevant circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
363.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
